Version 1.2 release.

New target orbit displays, dynamic splitscreen for G19 and bugfixes.

When on the split screen on the G19, you can now independently change what is displayed on the top and bottom halves of the screen using the up button to cycle the top and the down button to cycle the bottom. (buttons next to the display). Menu cycles the full screen modes.

Current vessel vs. Target displays are indicated by either and 'airplane' or crosshair (+) icon. Current vessel orbits are yellow and target orbits are blue.
